title: Vin-Checker
registration_failed: A user with this e-mail is already registered.
invalid_credentials: The password or e-mail is incorrect.
faq_q1: How do I get a VIN report?
faq_a1: Enter your VIN on the home page and click “Check VIN.”
faq_a2: You can get a report without registering, but it won’t be saved to your dashboard.
faq_q3: How do I download a previously generated report?
faq_a3: Go to your Dashboard and click “Download PDF” next to the report you need.
